channel.title: brent-saylor on Cottenie Lab
channel.description: Recent content in brent-saylor on Cottenie Lab

item.description: I am a PhD student in the department of integrative biology, co-supervised by Karl Cottenie and Ryan Gregory. My research interests lie in adapting ecology methods for use on genomic data, explaining patterns of abundance and diversity in transposable elements, thinking about the genome in three dimensions, and the philosophy of biology. I am also interested in ways to make genome-scale data accessible. I am also part of a working group the Philosophy and Biology working group.
